ace.AirTrapSpell.desc: Creates a sigil of air that thrusts the victim skyward
ace.FireTrapSpell.desc: Creates a sigil of fire that burns the victim
ace.EarthTrapSpell.desc: Creates a sigil of earth that poisons the victim
ace.WaterTrapSpell.desc: Creates a sigil of water that freezes the victim
ace.AlchemySpell.desc: Can turn various tapped materials into gold blocks
ace.AngelicRebirthSpell.desc: Wills a target to live an angelic life, giving them a second chance and flight
ace.AscendSpell.desc: Transposes the user to the highest block above them
ace.BalanceHydrationSpell.desc: The user balances there water levels, removing bad effects, but giving them a short nausea
ace.BedwardsSpell.desc: Transports the user to their bed location, if it exists
ace.BurySpell.desc: drops a victim 2 blocks downwards, burying them
ace.CaveSpell.desc: Mines a 3x3x3 area around the user
ace.ChainLightningSpell.desc: Creates a beam of lightning that also hits other enemies
ace.ConjureBlockSpell.desc: Conjures a block at the tapped location
ace.ConjureDubstepSpell.desc: Plays the user a certain tune from a hellish dimension
ace.ConjureJazzSpell.desc: Plays the user a certain tune from a time gone by
ace.ConjureFireSpell.desc: Conjures a fire block at a tapped location
ace.ConjureLight.desc: Conjures an invisible light source at a tapped location
ace.CreateIceSpike.desc: Forms a sharp spear out of a tapped block of ice
ace.CreatePickaxe.desc: Creates a pickaxe out of natural materials
ace.DeadlockSpell.desc: Creates a magical barrier around the caster and their victim
ace.DetobeamSpell.desc: Invokes a beam that will explode if it hits a mob
ace.DisableMagicSpell.desc: Prevents users in an area from using magic (including the user)
ace.DisableRedstone.desc: Burns a redstone wire out, rendering it non functioning until right clicked
ace.DisarmSpell.desc: Removes a targets main and offhand items
ace.DodgeSpell.desc: Summons a large wind to help the caster dodge attacks
ace.DrainSpell.desc: damages a victim, and restores that health to the caster
ace.EarthLaunchSpell.desc: Summons earthen pillars that thrust a victim (and sometimes the caster) skyward
ace.EmberSpell.desc: Throws an ember from the caster
ace.EntrappingBeamSpell.desc: Creates a beam that traps a hit target in a magical box
ace.EscapeSpell.desc: Transports the caster to a random location semi-nearby
ace.ExtractNutrients.desc: The user regains hunger by consuming a leafage block
ace.FlamethrowerSpell.desc: Creates a fiery beam that burns a hit target
ace.FreezeSpell.desc: Freezes a touched mob, encasing them in ice
ace.FrostSeedSpell.desc: Creates a block of ice that will continue to spread
ace.GillsSpell.desc: Grants the caster temporary gills, allowing them to breath underwater
ace.GrappleSpell.desc: Pulls a target mob towards the caster
ace.HealingHandSpell.desc: Touches a target with radiance, restoring some health to them
ace.HealingTouchSpell.desc: Touches a target with radiance, restoring a bit of health to them
ace.HealosphereSpell.desc: Creates an area of radiance, causing all nearby mobs and players to gain regeneration
ace.HealSpell.desc: Restores some health to the caster
ace.HeatResistSpell.desc: Makes the users skin heat resistant, granting them fire resistance for a short time
ace.HeroSpell.desc: Gives the caster the aire of a hero for a short amount of time, lowering prices
ace.HwachaSpell.desc: Launches a wall of fireworks from the caster
aceHydroBeamSpell.desc: Invokes a beam of high pressure water
ace.IceShardSpell.desc: throws a freezing ball of ice at a foe
ace.IncinerateSpell.desc: Combust certain burnable blocks around the caster
ace.LeafShotSpell.desc: Throws sharp leaves at a foe
ace.LeapSpell.desc: Causes the caster to be launched safely skyward
ace.LetThemBurnSpell.desc: Curses all entities around the caster, making the sun betray them
ace.MagicArmourSpell.desc: Forms an arcane shield around the caster
ace.MagicCoatSpell.desc: Forms an arcane film around the caster
ace.MagicTowerSpell.desc: Builds a tower of magical blocks where the caster taps
ace.MementoSpell.desc: Causes the user and all nearby entities to die unless they have a diamond
ace.MineSpell.desc: Mines the block the caster taps
ace.NoCastingSpell.desc: denies the touched entity the ability to cast spells
ace.OffYouGoSpell.desc: Straps a touched entity to a firework rocket
ace.PartyTrickSpell.desc: Creates a multicoloured firework where the user taps
ace.PauseTimeSpell.desc: Entangles nearby mobs, Illusionary time stopping
ace.PilgrimageSpell.desc: Causes the caster to look in the direction of the nearest desert temple
ace.PoisonBeamSpell.desc: Invokes a foul beam of poison
ace.PushSpell.desc: Uses arcane force to move a tapped mob back
ace.QuickenSpell.desc: Causes the caster to be light on their feet, making them move quicker and jump higher
ace.RaiseIronGolemSpell.desc: Summons an iron golem to fight alongside the caster
ace.RaiseSnowGolemSpell.desc: Summons an snow golem to fight alongside the caster
ace.ReformSpell.desc: Grants the user self-regeneration but also makes them slow
ace.RefuseToDieSpell.desc: Grants the caster the second chance effect, reviving them on death
ace.ResonantFlameSpell.desc: Creates a sound wave that sets nearby mobs on fire
ace.RideSpell.desc: Allows the caster to magically ride any mob
ace.RingOfFireSpell.desc: Creates a ring of fire around a touched mob
ace.RocketSpell.desc: Launches a firework rocket at a foe
ace.RollSpell.desc: Allows the user to tap the ground and negate fall damage
ace.SabotageRedstoneSpell.desc: Fries nearby redstone wire, causing it to not work until interacted with
ace.SlowFallSpell.desc: Causes the caster to fall slowly
ace.SmiteSpell.desc: Invokes a beam that drops a lightning bolt on the mob it hits
ace.SolarPoweredSpell.desc: Uses the suns rays to feed the user
ace.SonicBoomSpell.desc: Fires a fast object towards a mob, knocking them back
ace.SpiritWalkSpell.desc: Teleports the user to the block they tap, allowing for strange transportation
ace.SqueezeSpell.desc: Removes the water from certain blocks
ace.SummonDoomedCatSpell.desc: Summons a loyal cat that disappears after some time
ace.SummonDoomedDogSpell.desc: Summons a loyal dog that disappears after some time
ace.SwitchBeamSpell.desc: Switches the positions of the mob hit by the beam and the caster
ace.ThornRainSpell.desc: Invokes a rain of sharp leaves
ace.TornadoSpell.desc: Throws nearby mobs in random directions
ace.TouchOfDoomSpell.desc: Dooms the touched mob, killing them after some time, unless they have a diamond
ace.TryAgainSpell.desc: Allows the touched mob to try again, granting them the second chance effect
ace.UndeadCurseSpell.desc: Curses the touched mob, making them sun betray them
ace.UpdraftSpell.desc: Causes an area to launch all its contents skyward
ace.VanishingActSpell.desc: Sends the item in the casters offhand to their enderchest
ace.WindCallSpell.desc: Grants the caster the temporary ability to fly
ace.IcarusSpell.desc: Grants all nearby mobs the ability to fly, but they may not do so in sunlight
